title: Matrix State Schema
description: Schema for a persistent Matrix knowledge base state. This schema defines representation only and has no epistemic or normative authority.

matrix_id.description: Unique identifier of this Matrix state snapshot.

generated_at.description: Timestamp when this Matrix state was generated.

runs.description: Identifiers of all Runs contributing artifacts to this Matrix state.

policy.description: Reference to the research-program (policy) version enforced for this Matrix state.

artifacts.description: Canonical epistemic artifacts for this domain.

sources.description: Reference to source or provenance artifacts.

enrichments.description: Optional non-authoritative enrichment artifacts (e.g. evaluations, experience markers, 'bad', 'failed').

path.description: Relative path to the artifact file within the Matrix storage.

format.description: Optional format hint (e.g. json, jsonl, csv).

count.description: Optional number of entries contained in the artifact.

run_id.description: Identifier of the Run that produced this artifact.
